parameters.description: The account to search in; either the username or the UUID in curly braces
parameters.name: username

parameters.description: Which page of the search results to retrieve
parameters.name: page

parameters.description: How many search results to retrieve per page
parameters.name: pagelen

404.description: Search is not enabled for the requested team, navigate to [https://bitbucket.org/search](https://bitbucket.org/search) to turn it on

429.description: Too many requests, try again later

summary: Search for code in the repositories of the specified team
